organisation_name: Royal Holloway and Bedford New College (RHUL)
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit: Royal Holloway, University of London is one of the UK’s leading research-intensive universities covering a broad range of subjects spanning the arts and humanities, sciences, social sciences, management and economics.
relevant_communication:
The University works extensively with universities and companies on research and innovation projects, and policies at the EU level. 
 
University staff interact with members of the Commission
